carpet.rule.anvilItemCostRollupAlgorithm: Customize the algorithm for changing the cumulative penalty of an anvil on an item after using an anvil on an item. This is independent with the anvil algorithm settings.
carpet.rule.tickFreezeWhenNoPlayers.name: tickFreezeWhenNoPlayers
carpet.rule.tickFreezeWhenNoPlayers.desc: Automatically call /tick freeze when no players are online to prevent world updates. No use when in single-player.
carpet.rule.anvilUseRenameCost.name: anvilUseRenameCost
carpet.rule.anvilUseRenameCost.desc: Does anvil should have 1 leve cost when renaming things. Only affects when using mod anvil algorithms.
carpet.rule.anvilUseItemCost.name: anvilUseItemCost
carpet.rule.anvilUseItemCost.desc: Does anvil should adds the item-use-cost to the total costs. Only affects when using mod anvil algorithms. Independents with anvil item-use-cost rollup algorithm.
carpet.rule.anvilTooExpensiveLimit.name: anvilTooExpensiveLimit
carpet.rule.anvilTooExpensiveLimit.desc: The maximum cost of an anvil, controls on how much costs the anvil should report TOO EXPENSIVE. Only affects when using mod anvil algorithms.
carpet.rule.anvilAlgorithm.name: anvilAlgorithm
carpet.rule.anvilAlgorithm.desc: Customize the algorithm that calculates the result and costs for a anvil. Independents with item's anvil-use-cost rollup algorithm.
carpet.rule.anvilCustomNameSerializer.de: Customize the serializer used for anvil renaming items. May available only on this mod installed on client. Only affects when using mod anvil algorithms.
carpet.rule.anvilCanRepairUseIronBlock.d: Can repair a breaking anvil by right-clicking it with an iron block iron hand.
carpet.rule.ignoringPlayersOnAutoTickFre: Which users should be ignored for allow server ticking in tickFreezeWhenNoPlayers. Each username should separated by comma, or use * to capture all characters.
carpet.rule.ignoringPlayersOnSleeping.de: Which users should be ignored when server calculating how many player is sleeping, the ignored user will not be calculated to the total and the sleeping users.
carpet.rule.animalDamageImmune.name: animalDamageImmune
carpet.rule.animalDamageImmune.desc: Which animals should be protected from play attacks. Multiple predefined groups or entity id can be set here, separated by comma.
carpet_nukos_add.pets.damage_protected: The %s is protected. Crouch to bypass.
